 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵ֫זֶר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Ps.132.18|Ps 132:18]]</sup> ==consecration, crown, Naziriteship==; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> absolute [[2Sam.1.10|2Sam 1:10]] +; construct [[Exod.29.6|Exod 29:6]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִזֵרוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.89.40|Ps 89:40]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִזְרֵךְ‎</span> [[Jer.7.29|Jer 7:29]] — 

**1.** ***crown*** (sign of consecration; [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzeu iii. 118</sup> compare Syriac <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קדשא‎</span> [<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">], ***earring***; see also [[BDB#Gei|Gei]]<sup>Jüd. Zeitschr. x. 45 ff.</sup> on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶזֶם‎</span>): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of king [[2Sam.1.10|2Sam 1:10]]; [[2Kgs.11.12|2Kgs 11:12]] = [[2Chr.23.11|2Chr 23:11]] symbol of royal power [[Ps.89.40|Ps 89:40]]; [[Ps.132.18|Ps 132:18]] compare [[Prov.27.24|Prov 27:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבְּנֵי נ‎</span> [[Zech.9.16|Zech 9:16]] ***stones of a crown, diadem*** (probably; &gt; [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] — who strike out, compare [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] — ***stones of charming***, from use of precious stones as charms. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of high priest, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקֹּדֶשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Exod.29.6|Exod 29:6]], made of gold [[Exod.39.30|Exod 39:30]]; [[Lev.8.9|Lev 8:9]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2.** woman's ***hair*** (originally probably of long hair as sign of consecration, as in Nazirite vow, compare [[Num.6.19|Num 6:19]] below, and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזַיר‎</span> also [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Sklzzen iii. 117, 107; Arab. Heidenthum 2, p. 143</sup> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 464. 2d ed. 483</sup>), [[Jer.7.29|Jer 7:29]] (of personified Jerusalem). 

**3.** ***consecration*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of high priest <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עליו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁמֶן מִשְׁחַת א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Lev.21.12|Lev 21:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***the consecration of the oil of anointing of his God is upon him.*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** in [[Num.6|Num 6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), specifically of Nazirite consecration (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזִיר‎</span>) : <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלֹהָיו עָלָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Num.6.7|Num 6:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶדֶר נִזְרוֺ‎</span> v[[Num.6.5|Num 6:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טָמֵא נ‎</span> v[[Num.6.12|Num 6:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראֹשׁ נ‎</span> (because of unshorn hair) v[[Num.6.9|Num 6:9]] v[[Num.6.18|Num 6:18]] v[[Num.6.18|Num 6:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(כָּלֿ) יְמֵי נ‎</span> v[[Num.6.4|Num 6:4]] v[[Num.6.8|Num 6:8]] v[[Num.6.12|Num 6:12]] v[[Num.6.13|Num 6:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרַת נ‎</span> v[[Num.6.21|Num 6:21]] b compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלנֿ‎</span> v[[Num.6.21|Num 6:21]]a; in v[[Num.6.19|Num 6:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> = ***the hair of his consecration*** (compare [[Jer.7.29|Jer 7:29]] above).
